doc:
Mary Elizabeth McDonough https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Elizabeth_McDonough 0 Mary Elizabeth McDonough (born May 4, 1961) is an American actress, best known for her role as Erin Walton on The Waltons from 1972 to 1981. In 1988, she married Rob Wickstrom, with whom she has a daughter, Sydnee. The couple divorced in 1996. She has lupus erythematosus, claimed to be from leaking silicone breast implants. In the 2000s, she returned to television acting, guest-starring on Boston Legal and The New Adventures of Old Christine. McDonough is a radio guest and has been on international and syndicated shows such as Get Focused Radio with Kate Hennessy. She can be seen on the internet on the show McDougall M.D. as part of the broadcasts on the TBN network. Mary_Elizabeth McDonough ( born May_4_,_1961 ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_role as Erin_Walton on The_Waltons from 1972 to 1981 . In 1988 , she married Rob_Wickstrom , with whom she has a_daughter , Sydnee . The_couple divorced in 1996 . She has lupus_erythematosus , claimed_to_be from leaking silicone_breast_implants . In the_2000s , she returned to television_acting , guest-starring on Boston_Legal and The_New_Adventures of Old_Christine . McDonough is a_radio_guest and has_been on international_and_syndicated_shows such_as Get_Focused_Radio with Kate_Hennessy . She can_be_seen on the_internet on the_show_McDougall_M.D. as part of the_broadcasts on the_TBN_network .
